Title: Asterix and Obelix vs. Caesar
Writer: René Goscinny (comic book), Albert Uderzo (comic book), Claude Zidi (screenplay), Gérard Lauzier (dialogue)
Actors: Christian Clavier, Gérard Depardieu, Roberto Benigni, Michel Galabru
Plot: Inhabitants of the last unconquered village in Gaul (ancient France) use a magical potion to hold their independence from Roman invaders.
Production: Odeon Films, Films 7, Président Films, Cecchi Gori Group Tiger Cinema, Canal+, Bavaria Entertainment, Renn Productions, Filmförderungsanstalt, Centre National de la Cinematographie, Melampo Cinematografica, Pathé, TF1 Films Production, AMLF, Katharina, Eurimages, Neue Constantin Film, FilmFernsehFonds Bayern
